recipesJson.name: Beavers ass
recipesJson.author: Loosley
recipesJson.description:
This juice is dam good! 
"These words are only here to bulk out the description"

reviews.text: Not bad at all this. Nice simple recipe with plenty of flavour. Mostly strawberry on the shake and vape, but the raspberry really comes through after a couple of days with a nice creamy topping and a hint of vanilla
